exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
m: lb
l: lb

Goal:
l ⪯ m -> ⟦ l ⟧ ≲ ⟦ m ⟧

Premises:
Notation lb := (list bool)
lb_nat_app : forall l m : lb, ⟦ l ++ m ⟧ = ⟦ l ⟧ + power (length l) 2 * ⟦ m ⟧
lb_nat_fix_1 : forall l : lb, ⟦ ⟘ :: l ⟧ = 2 * ⟦ l ⟧
lb_nat_fix_2 : forall l : lb, ⟦ ⟙ :: l ⟧ = 1 + 2 * ⟦ l ⟧
lb_nat_fix_3 : forall (x : bool) (l : lb), ⟦ x :: l ⟧ = bool2nat x + 2 * ⟦ l ⟧
lb_mask_equiv = fun l m : lb => l ⪯ m /\ m ⪯ l : lb -> lb -> Prop Arguments lb_mask_equiv (_ _)%list_scope
lb_nat_fix_0 = eq_refl : ⟦ nil ⟧ = 0
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_mask_trans : forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> m ⪯ k -> l ⪯ k
lb_mask_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ++ a ⪯ m ++ b
lb_meet_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↓ a ⪯ m ↓ b
lb_join_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↑ a ⪯ m ↑ b
lb_ortho_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
lb_ortho_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_mask_leb : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_mask_inv_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⪯ y :: m -> x ⪦ y /\ l ⪯ m
Inductive lb_ortho : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_ortho_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⟂ l | in_lb_ortho_1 : forall l : lb, l ⟂ nil | in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m Arguments lb_ortho (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_1 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_2 [x y]%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_mask_inv_cons_cons : forall l m : lb, ⟙ :: l ⪯ ⟘ :: m -> False
in_ble_1 : forall n m : nat, rem n 2 <= rem m 2 -> div n 2 ≲ div m 2 -> n ≲ m
lb_pointwise = fun f : bool -> bool -> bool => fix lb_pointwise (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => match m with | nil => nil | _ :: _ => map (f ⟘) m end | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => map (fun x0 : bool => f x0 ⟘) l | y :: m0 => f x y :: lb_pointwise l0 m0 end end : (bool -> bool -> bool) -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_pointwise _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope
lb_pointwise_mono_left : forall f : bool -> bool -> bool, (forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b) -> f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ -> forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> lb_pointwise f k l ⪯ lb_pointwise f k m
lb_mask_equiv_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ≂ m -> a ≂ b -> l ++ a ≂ m ++ b
binary_le_inv : forall n m : nat, n ≲ m -> n = 0 \/ div n 2 ≲ div m 2 /\ rem n 2 <= rem m 2
lb_mask_equiv_trans : forall l m k : lb, l ≂ m -> m ≂ k -> l ≂ k
lb_mask_equiv_sym : forall l m : lb, l ≂ m -> m ≂ l
Inductive binary_le : nat -> nat -> Prop := in_ble_0 : forall n : nat, 0 ≲ n | in_ble_1 : forall n m : nat, rem n 2 <= rem m 2 -> div n 2 ≲ div m 2 -> n ≲ m Arguments binary_le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_ble_0 _%nat_scope Arguments in_ble_1 (_ _)%nat_scope
binary_le_sind : forall P : nat -> nat -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P 0 n) -> (forall n m : nat, rem n 2 <= rem m 2 -> div n 2 ≲ div m 2 -> P (div n 2) (div m 2) -> P n m) -> forall n n0 : nat, n ≲ n0 -> P n n0
binary_le_ind : forall P : nat -> nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P 0 n) -> (forall n m : nat, rem n 2 <= rem m 2 -> div n 2 ≲ div m 2 -> P (div n 2) (div m 2) -> P n m) -> forall n n0 : nat, n ≲ n0 -> P n n0
lb_meet_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> (l ++ a) ↓ (m ++ b) = l ↓ m ++ a ↓ b
in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m
lb_pointwise_sym : forall (f : bool -> bool -> bool) (l m : lb), (forall x y : bool, f x y = f y x) -> lb_pointwise f l m = lb_pointwise f m l
lb_join_comm : forall l m : lb, l ↑ m = m ↑ l
lb_meet_comm : forall l m : lb, l ↓ m = m ↓ l
lb_ortho_cons_inv : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> (x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘) /\ l ⟂ m
lb_pointwise_length : forall (f : bool -> bool -> bool) (n : nat) (l m : lb), length l <= n -> length m <= n -> length (lb_pointwise f l m) <= n
lb_join_length_le : forall (n : nat) (l m : lb), length l <= n -> length m <= n -> length (l ↑ m) <= n
lb_meet_length_le : forall (n : nat) (l m : lb), length l <= n -> length m <= n -> length (l ↓ m) <= n
in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil

``` 
intros H.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
apply lb_mask_leb in H1.
apply binary_le_inv in H2.
rewrite lb_nat_app.
rewrite lb_nat_app.
rewrite lb_nat_app.
rewrite H1.
rewrite H2.
auto.
```

original: intros H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply lb_mask_leb in H1. apply binary_le_inv in H2. rewrite lb_nat_app. rewrite lb_nat_app. rewrite lb_nat_app. rewrite H1. rewrite H2. auto.
